languages.text: "Мне понятно желание Вольного Торговца держать все под своим контролем. И все же я не вправе распоряжаться тайной информацией агентов дознавателя". {n}Ахиллеас опускает взгляд и учтиво кивает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Мне понятно желание Вольного Торговца держать все под своим контролем. И все же я не в праве распоряжаться тайной информацией агентов дознавателя". {n}Ахиллеас опускает взгляд и учтиво кивает.{/n}

languages.text: "I can understand your desire as a Rogue Trader to have everything under your control. And yet I am not at liberty to make use of classified information related to the Interrogator's agents in whatever way I see fit." {n}Achilleas lowers his gaze and nods politely.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мне понятно желание Вольного Торговца держать все под своим контролем. И все же я не вправе распоряжаться тайной информацией агентов дознавателя". {n}Ахиллеас опускает взгляд и учтиво кивает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I can understand your desire as a Rogue Trader to have everything under your control. And yet I'm not at liberty to do with classified information related to the Interrogator's agents as I see fit." {n}Achilleas lowers his gaze and nods politely.{/n}

"I can understand your desire as a Rogue Trader to have everything under your control. And yet I'm not at liberty to do with classified information related to the Interrogator's agents as I see fit." {n}Achilleas lowers his gaze and nods politely.{/n}

"I can understand your desire as a Rogue Trader to have everything under your control. And yet I am not at liberty to make use of classified information related to the Interrogator's agents in whatever way I see fit." {n}Achilleas lowers his gaze and nods politely.{/n}

"I can understand your desire as a Rogue Trader to have everything under your control. And yet I am not at liberty to make use of classified information related to the Interrogator's agents in whatever way I see fit." {n}Achilleas lowers his gaze and nods politely.{/n}

"I can understand your desire as a Rogue Trader to have everything under your control. And yet I am not at liberty to make use of classified information related to the Interrogator's agents in whatever way I see fit." {n}Achilleas lowers his gaze and nods politely.{/n}

languages.text: “我能理解。您身为行商浪人，希望将一切都置于您的控制之下，但我却不能以任何我认为合适的方式，将审讯官的特工有关的机密信息透露给您。”{n}阿吉里亚斯低下了头，礼貌地点了点头。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I can understand your desire as a Rogue Trader to have everything under your control. And yet I am not at liberty to make use of classified information related to the Interrogator's agents in whatever way I see fit." {n}Achilleas lowers his gaze and nods politely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我能理解。您身为行商浪人，希望将一切都置于您的控制之下，但我却不能以任何我认为合适的方式，将审讯官的特工有关的机密信息透露给您。”{n}阿吉里亚斯低下了头，礼貌地点了点头。{/n}

languages.text: «Como Comerciante Independiente, entiendo que quiera controlarlo todo. Sin embargo, no se me permite usar la información confidencial de la que disponemos los agentes del interrogador de cualquier manera». {n}Achilleas baja la mirada y asiente educadamente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I can understand your desire as a Rogue Trader to have everything under your control. And yet I am not at liberty to make use of classified information related to the Interrogator's agents in whatever way I see fit." {n}Achilleas lowers his gaze and nods politely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Como Comerciante Independiente, entiendo que quiera controlarlo todo. Sin embargo, no se me permite usar la información confidencial de la que disponemos los agentes del interrogador de cualquier manera». {n}Achilleas baja la mirada y asiente educadamente.{/n}

languages.text: 「自由開拓者としてすべてを自分の支配下に置きたいという欲求は理解できます。ですが、インテロゲイターの職員が関与する機密情報を私の好き勝手に扱うことはできません」{n}アキレアスは伏し目がちに恭しくうなずく。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I can understand your desire as a Rogue Trader to have everything under your control. And yet I am not at liberty to make use of classified information related to the Interrogator's agents in whatever way I see fit." {n}Achilleas lowers his gaze and nods politely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者としてすべてを自分の支配下に置きたいという欲求は理解できます。ですが、インテロゲイターの職員が関与する機密情報を私の好き勝手に扱うことはできません」{n}アキレアスは伏し目がちに恭しくうなずく。{/n}

languages.text: "Ich verstehe Euren Wunsch als {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, alles unter Eurer Kontrolle zu haben. Dennoch steht es mir nicht frei, geheime Informationen über die Agenten des Interrogators so einzusetzen, wie ich es für richtig halte." {n}Achilleas senkt den Blick und nickt höflich.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I can understand your desire as a Rogue Trader to have everything under your control. And yet I am not at liberty to make use of classified information related to the Interrogator's agents in whatever way I see fit." {n}Achilleas lowers his gaze and nods politely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich verstehe Euren Wunsch als {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, alles unter Eurer Kontrolle zu haben. Dennoch steht es mir nicht frei, geheime Informationen über die Agenten des Interrogators so einzusetzen, wie ich es für richtig halte." {n}Achilleas senkt den Blick und nickt höflich.{/n}

languages.text: « Je comprends qu'en tant que {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, vous souhaitiez tout contrôler. Malheureusement, je ne suis pas libre de disposer des informations confidentielles concernant les agents de l'interrogateur comme bon me semble, » {n}conclut Achilleas en s'inclinant avec courtoisie, le regard baissé.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I can understand your desire as a Rogue Trader to have everything under your control. And yet I am not at liberty to make use of classified information related to the Interrogator's agents in whatever way I see fit." {n}Achilleas lowers his gaze and nods politely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je comprends qu'en tant que {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, vous souhaitiez tout contrôler. Malheureusement, je ne suis pas libre de disposer des informations confidentielles concernant les agents de l'interrogateur comme bon me semble, » {n}conclut Achilleas en s'inclinant avec courtoisie, le regard baissé.{/n}

languages.text: "Hür Tacir olarak her şeyin kontrolünün kendinizde olmasını istemenizi anlayabiliyorum ancak Sorgucu'nun emrindekilerle ilgili gizli bilgileri uygun gördüğüm şekilde kullanma özgürlüğüne sahip değilim." {n}Achilleas, bakışlarını yere indirip nazikçe başını eğiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I can understand your desire as a Rogue Trader to have everything under your control. And yet I am not at liberty to make use of classified information related to the Interrogator's agents in whatever way I see fit." {n}Achilleas lowers his gaze and nods politely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bir Hür Tacir olarak her şeyin kontrolünün kendinizde olmasını istemenizi anlayabiliyorum ancak Sorgucu'nun emrindekilerle ilgili gizli bilgileri uygun gördüğüm şekilde kullanma özgürlüğüne sahip değilim." {n}Achilleas bakışlarını yere indiriyor ve nazikçe başını eğiyor.{/n}
